# Getting started

## Install

```cli
npm i living-api -D
```

## Example 1

```html
<h2>Hello World 1</h2>

sdsd
sdsdsds
datalist
```

```js
console.log('JS');
```

## Example 2


```html
<h2>Hello World 2</h2>

sdsd
sdsdsds
datalist
```

## Example 3

```html
<h2>Hello World 3</h2>

sdsd
sdsdsds
datalist
```


Here comes the rest


## Breakpoints

|       Name | Extra small |  Small | Medium |  Large | Extra large |
|-----------:|:-----------:|:------:|:------:|:------:|:-----------:|
| Breakpoint |    <576px   | ≥576px | ≥768px | ≥992px |   ≥1200px   |
|     Prefix |      xs     |   sm   |   md   |   lg   |      xl     |
